title: 1.4 Master Challenge 2
question: John uses an e-commerce platform to do all his shopping. He frequently gets advertisements about various products that he searches for on this particular shopping platform and on almost every other application he uses on his phone. This incites him to shop more. What should he do in order to stop seeing the ads?

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
